mapper.insert: insert into department (department_num, department_name, department_phone, department_addr, zip, addr1, addr2, depatyment_addr) values (#{departmentNum}, #{departmentName}, #{departmentPhone}, #{departmentAddr}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{depatymentAddr})
mapper.select: select department_num departmentNum, department_name departmentName, department_phone departmentPhone, department_addr departmentAddr, zip, addr1, addr2, depatyment_addr depatymentAddr from department order by department_num desc
